articles.author: Jeremy Werner
articles.title: Quick hits: Jakucionis return sparks Illini in heated 94-69 rout at Indiana - 247Sports
articles.description: Jakucionis returned from a twogame absence to lead Illinois to a dominant and heated rout of the Hoosiers
articles.content:
Kasparas Jakucionis is just fine. More than fine, he's great actually. And so are the Illini when the star freshman is on the court.
After missing the two previous games with a left forearm injury, … [+5709 chars]
